history.narrative: Law 4-46 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-202, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first, first amended and second readings on June 16, 1981, June 30, 1981 and July 14, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 6, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-81 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
